name: Photoshop For Photographers
detail: In this course you will learn to use Photoshop efficiently straight from the beginning. Covering basics, layer masks, compositing, color grading, lighting, composition, portrait retouching and much more, the course has all it takes to master Photoshop as a photographer

name: Sky Replacement Bootcamp
detail: We've all had times when the weather isn't on our side and images get totally ruined. In this 6.5+ hour course we dive deep into the world of sky replacements. Learn through complicated challenges and learn the techniques that took me over 4 years to master.

name: Glowing Wave Photo Composite
detail: Learn through 40+ detailed lessons about compositing in Photoshop. We start by creating the composition with several images and then move further into blending, color grading, lighting and other useful techniques. This is truly the course you will need on compositing.

name: The Photoshop For Beginners
detail: In this course you will learn to use Photoshop With 0 prior experience. Covering layer masks, basics of compositing, cloning, blending lighting and much more. Begin to master Photoshop! This course is only available through the complete bundle.

name: The Guiding Light Photo Composite
detail: In this course you will learn how to create my most successful composite ever. This image granted me over 30000 followers within couple of months and it got shared on over 500+ Instagram pages. This course is only available through the complete bundle.

name: The Rivendell Photo Composite
detail: In this course you will learn to create stunning composites from scratch with 0 experience. Learn the basics of compositing, blending, lighting, composition, color grading and much more. This course is only available thorugh the complete bundle.

name: The New Years Photo Composite
detail: In this course you will learn how to create a viral composite from scratch. In the course you will also learn how to create viral concepts. Including blending, composition, lighting, color grading and much more. This course is only available through the complete bundle.

name: Stranger Things Photo Composite
detail: In this course you will learn to create the famous mind flayer from stranger things from scratch. Learn to turn a 2D object into a 3D object. Including blending, color grading, custom drawing and much more. This course is only available through the complete bundle.

name: Scottish Highlands Photo Composite
detail: In this course you will learn to create a complicated composite. This is a must for people wo want to improve their compositing skills in Photoshop. Learn complex blending, lighting and compositing techniques. This course is only available through the complete bundle.
